subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tortorella was suspended for one game by the N.H.L. because of a verbal confrontation he had with a fan behind the Rangers’ bench during the third period of the Rangers’ 4-0 loss Friday night in Washington.
snippet: John Tortorella was suspended for one game by the N.H.L. because of a verbal confrontation he had with a fan behind the Rangers’ bench during the third period of the Rangers’ 4-0 loss Friday night in Washington.
